About this event
In America, we don’t put up with would-be kings. NO KINGS is a national day of action and mass mobilization in response to increasing authoritarian excesses and corruption from Trump and his allies. We’ve watched as they’ve cracked down on free speech, detained people for their political views, threatened to deport American citizens, and defied the courts. They’ve done this all while continuing to serve and enrich their billionaire allies.

On Saturday, June 14, we’re taking to the streets nationwide. We’re not gathering to feed his ego. We’re building a movement that leaves him behind.

The flag doesn’t belong to Donald Trump. It belongs to us. We’re not watching history happen. We’re making it.

On June 14th, we’re showing up everywhere he isn’t—to say no thrones, no crowns, no kings. Check out nokings.org for more information.

A core principle behind all No Kings events is a commitment to nonviolent action. We expect all participants to seek to de-escalate any potential confrontation with those who disagree with our values.

title: Atlantic City No Kings Rally
description: Join us at the Atlantic City No Kings Rally to resist the MAGA regime with creative actions, face painting, special guests, and more. We aim to inspire change and reclaim democracy together.
raw_text:
Atlantic City No Kings Rally
Rally • Hosted by South Jersey Progressive Democrats

Time
Saturday, June 14
12 – 4pm EDT

Location
Chickie's & Pete's
2831 Boardwalk
Atlantic City, NJ 08401

About this event

On June 14, Donald Trump will honor himself with a four-mile military parade in our nation’s capitol. Trump’s tacky parade was inspired by dictators he idolizes, and will cost taxpayers nearly $100 million.

June 14 is our chance to reflect the absurdity of the MAGA regime and the clowns who lead it. To meet this moment, Women’s March will host community circuses nationwide—bold, creative actions that mirror the chaos MAGA has sown across the country. Together, we’ll set a national record for the most circuses held in a single day while we simultaneously refuse to celebrate a petty clown who desperately wants to be seen as strong. We won’t stop until we build the country we all deserve. Our grassroots street circuses turn satire into resistance and reclaim the big tent for democracy.

For this event, we will gather in a private room at Chickie and Pete's Atlantic City, where we can eat, socialize, and hear from special guests. There will be activities for kids like face painting and some supplies to make signs (everyone is welcome to bring their own signs of course!).

From there, we will proceed to the board walk and walk holding our signs!

title: NO KINGS Card Stunt
description: Join Indivisible Lambertville New Hope for a national day of action against authoritarianism. Participate in a card stunt to express democratic values and celebrate with a powerful and joyful event.
raw_text:
Indivisible Lambertville New Hope NO KINGS card stunt
Visibility Event · Volunteer organized for No Kings
NO KINGS NATIONWIDE DAY OF DEFIANCE JUNE 14, 2025
Time Saturday, June 14 9 – 10:30am EDT
Location This event's address is private. Sign up for more details.
About this event
Join Indivisible Lambertville New Hope for the “No Kings” Card Stunt!
“NO KINGS” is a national day of action and mass mobilization—on Saturday, June 14—in response to the increasing authoritarian excesses and corruption of the Trump administration. It is also Flag Day.
Indivisible Lambertville-New Hope (ILNH), along with our partners in the Indivisible One New Jersey (IONJ) coalition, is taking action on this day of defiance to reject authoritarianism. In doing so, we are sending a message to President Trump: No Kings! The American flag belongs to all of us!
What we will do:
We will perform a “card stunt.” We will gather on a large field and hold cards that together create two field-sized images: one supporting our democracy, and the other, reclaiming the American Flag. A drone will capture the event and we will share it on social media as a kickoff to No Kings Day.
We will use our democratic muscle to display a unified message of what we believe. The event will be powerful and full of joy!
Join this fun in the morning, then head to a larger rally if you wish. We might even caravan to another event!
We will also need lots of volunteers to help with logistics, ahead of time and on event day, for tasks like those listed below. If you can help, let us know in your sign up form!

title: NO KINGS RALLY - MORRISTOWN
description: Join us for the 'NO KINGS' rally to oppose authoritarian policies. We gather at Morristown Town Hall to demonstrate for democracy and highlight issues of free speech and justice.
sponsors: Planned Parenthood Action Fund of New Jersey
raw_text: NO KINGS RALLY - MORRISTOWN  Rally · Hosted by NJ 11th for Change  HANDS OFF OUR DEMOCRACY  Saturday June 14th 11 am 200 South Street Morristown, NJ  Morris County DEMS, NJ 11th for Change, New Jersey Citizen Action, Planned Parenthood Action Fund of New Jersey  Time  Saturday, June 14  11am – 12:30pm EDT  Location  Morristown Town Hall  200 South St  Morristown, NJ 07960  About this event  Morristown Town Hall, 200 South St. 11:00 AM - 12:30 PM Large crowds are expected. Carpool, use a ride share or public transportation. Stay together. Bring a fully charged phone; disable location services. There will be NO seating or public bathrooms. Dress appropriately for the weather. Wear sunscreen and avoid umbrellas. Bring water.  Please help to defray the expenses for this rally by making a contribution of any amount at https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mcdcnokings  WHAT IS “NO KINGS”?  NO KINGS is a national day of action and mass mobilization in response to the increasing authoritarian excesses and corruption of the Trump administration. We’ve watched as they’ve cracked down on free speech, detained people for their political positions, threatened to deport American citizens, and defied the courts. They’ve done this all while continuing to serve and enrich their billionaire allies. They think they rule—but we are bigger than even their worst aspirations.  PLEASE PARK LEGALLY and obey all signs. Parking will be a challenge. Carpool, rideshare, or use public transportation. There are several public parking lots in Morristown, including the lot behind Town Hall on Franklin St. DO NOT park in the Kings shopping lot. For your safety, cross only at crosswalks. South Street is a busy road. Remember, this is a PEACEFUL protest; do not engage with counter protestors or agitators.

This year’s Flag Day (June 14) is a national day of action, mass mobilization, and defiance in responses to the increasing authoritarian excesses and corruption of the Trump administration. About this event
Rally outside the Lyons VA, 151 Knollcroft Rd, Lyons, NJ because H.R. 1, the “One Big Beautiful Bill Act” includes toxic provisions that would change veterans’ benefits, weaken the protections that veterans have when they enter public service after retiring from the military, and will weaken the ability of the VA hospitals and the care promised to our veterans. title: No Kings South Jersey

raw_text:
No Kings South Jersey
Rally · Hosted by Cooper River Indivisible

No Kings
National Day of Defiance
March & Rally
Haddon Twp, NJ
1:00pm 6/14/25

Time
Saturday, June 14
1 – 4pm EDT

Location
Carlton Avenue & Haddon Avenue
Haddon Township, NJ 08108

About this event
Donald Trump is planning a fascist military parade on his birthday the likes of which would make North Korea blush. He's spending our tax money to throw himself a birthday party while he's cutting our healthcare and education to the bone and giving tax cuts to himself and Elon.

Cooper River Indivisible is hosting a march and rally! The march will begin at 1:00pm at Carlton Avenue and Haddon Avenue in Haddon Township, steps away from the Westmont Patco Station. We will march down Haddon Avenue to downtown Collingswood, where we will rally from 2:30 to 4:00pm. The rally location is Irvin Avenue and Atlantic Avenue. This is adjacent to the Collingswood Patco station, so it will be easy to take the train back to Haddon Township if you prefer not to walk.

More details are coming. Sign up to RSVP and to receive further updates as we cement the specifics.

Visit cooperriverindivisible.org to learn about everything we do, and find us on facebook, bluesky, instagram and tiktok.

title: No Kings Nationwide Day of Defiance
description: Join us for a National Day of Action in Belleville with No Kings Belleville and Belleville Area Friends Indivisible to protest against authoritarianism and corruption. We are building a movement for change and advocating for nonviolent action.
meeting_location: Sidewalk on the east side of Belleville Rd
raw_text:
No Kings Belleville!
BAFI
(Belleville Area Friends Indivisible) Fights Back!!
Scan to Register: [QR Code]
Time Saturday, June 14 3-5 pm EDT
Location Harris Park 10101 Belleville Rd Belleville, MI 48111
About this event
In America, we don’t put up with would-be kings. NO KINGS is a National Day of Action and mass mobilization in response to increasing authoritarian excesses and corruption from Trump and his allies. We’ve watched as they’ve cracked down on free speech, detained people for their political views, threatened to deport American citizens, and defied the courts. They’ve done all this while continuing to serve and enrich their billionaire allies.

On Saturday, June 14, we’re taking to the streets nationwide. We’re not gathering to feed his ego. We’re building a movement that leaves him behind.

The flag doesn’t belong to Donald Trump. It belongs to us. We’re not watching history happen. We’re making it.

On June 14th, we’re showing up everywhere he isn’t—to say no thrones, no crowns, no kings. Check out nokings.org for more information.

A core principle behind all No Kings events is a commitment to nonviolent action. We expect all participants to seek to de-escalate any potential confrontation with those who disagree with our values.

We will demonstrate on the sidewalk on the east side of Belleville Rd.
Possible parking includes empty lots (formerly Twisted Rooster) and shopping center lots AWAY from customer entrances.
And Information table, including fun tools for the kids!

title: Celebration of Science, Learning, and Libraries
description: Join us to advocate against the elimination of critical funding to libraries, cuts to science grants, and attacks on education. Gather at Sylvester Park and march to the Capitol Building for speeches.
address: Legislative Building - North Steps, Sylvester Park
raw_text:
Flame the Enlightenment

CELEBRATION OF SCIENCE, LEARNING, AND LIBRARIES

Legislative Building - North Steps, Sylvester Park, Olympia, WA

July 12, 2025

11AM-3PM

Carl Sagan, the science popularizer wrote in the book, "Demon-Haunted World: Science as a Candle in the Dark," that attacks on science, education and libraries brought about the Dark Ages. Meet at Sylvester Park, then march to the North Steps of the Capital Building for speakers. Protest the elimination of critical funding to the Institute of Library Sciences (IMLS), cuts to critical science grants, and the attacks on higher education, and public instruction. Please contact Wendy at 360-349-2158 or wendy.tassoni@gmail.com.
raw_summary: The image is an event flyer for "Celebration of Science, Learning, and Libraries," scheduled for July 12, 2025, from 11 AM to 3 PM. It will take place at the Legislative Building - North Steps, Sylvester Park, Olympia, WA. The event is about advocating against attacks on science and education. It includes a march and talks to protest against funding cuts to libraries and education sectors.
